info.name: Toolbars - Buttons Closer for Firefox 2
info.description:
Buttons closer on toolbars ignoring theme settings.
(It ignores border, background style and size from the operating system's theme)
Elements closer on statusbar.
Slim toolbars!

It works with Firefox default theme and Qute!
Use Small Icons.

Tested only on pc (I do not own a Mac!)

You can find last enhancements in "style 1056" (it is unstable)
